{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3000052,"name":"Yaniv","username":"Yaniv2096","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/y/b77776/{size}.png","created_at":"2022-01-29T18:21:41.326Z","cooked":"

Hi,
We hava a .bat/.py script on out local computer which we would like to execute every time we hit the Shift+F5 (build).
Maybe anyway through the Gradle but I don’t know how.
Thanks
